extension.summary: Watch xStream!
extension.description: Mit diesem Addon kannst du auf alle angebotenen Streams verschiedenster deutschen Quellen zugreifen
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

extension.summary: Python HTTP for Humans
extension.description: Packed for KODI from https://pypi.org/project/requests/

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täielikult uuesti disainitud, et luua tänapäevane välimus samas säilitades klassikaline Aeoni tunnetus.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l’esprit classique d’Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
Полностью переработан, чтобы создать современный облик, сохраняя при этом классическое чувство Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
extension.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.2[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add an option for 2, 3, and 4 seconds to fanart per image time[CR]- Fix star ratings in DialogSubtitles.xml[CR]- Vertical Menu fixes[CR]- Add option to Fullscreen Video Info to Show More Details when pressing down[CR]- Fixes for LibreELEC and CoreELEC settings menus[CR]- PVR fixes and additions[CR]- Add support for Atmos and DTS:X icons[CR]- Add Fanart List for Sets[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.1[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Make fullscreen info for recordings (Skin settings > Customization > Live TV) and add-ons (Skin settings > Customization > Video OSD) opt-in[CR]- Fix auto fullscreen music launching on PVR playback[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.0[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add RightList and Logo views for Movie Sets[CR]- Fix for Square Widgets[CR]- Add option to move VideoOSD buttons to top[CR]- Add tiny posters to Fullscreen Wall[CR]- Caviar Dreams font fixes[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: Unfussy Skin by Louis 2019
unfussy skin by Louis 2019
extension.description: Ein "schnörkelloser" Skin, insbesondere auf die Benutzung von LiveTV ausgelegt. Features: Konfigurierbares Menü, große Anzahl kofigurierbarer Widgets im Hauptmenü, PVR Guide mit 4 - 10 Sendern, angepasste PVR Views und vieles mehr...

An "unfussy" skin, in particular designed for watching LiveTV. Features: customizable menu, large number of configurable main menu widgets, pvr guide with 4 up to 10 channels, customized pvr views and much more...
extension.license: CC BY-SA 4.0, GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.0
